name: fb-code-verify
description: Browser extensions to verify FB code running in the browser against a published manifest
author: Richard Hansen <rrh@fb.com>

scripts.build-local-dev: yarn clean && yarn lint && yarn copyStaticFilesAndConfig && yarn makeBundle
scripts.lint: yarn makePrettier && yarn run eslint src/js/**
scripts.copyChromeFilesAndConfig: cp config/* dist/chrome && cp images/* dist/chrome && cp src/html/* dist/chrome && cp src/css/* dist/chrome
scripts.copyEdgeFilesAndConfig: cp config/* dist/edge && cp images/* dist/edge && cp src/html/* dist/edge && cp src/css/* dist/edge
